channel.title: Need some serious help please.. This is extremely weird shit
channel.description:
Ok so i started to make a private server 2 days ago and it was fine but about after 20 minutes after running it i started to get nulled by an ip. So i banned the ip but it still came through. I added anti null/syi (1 connection per ip) and they STILL came in. So i downloaded other sources with anti null (PI,ETC) And STILL nulls. So then i decided to make a whole new server today so i deleted that old no-ip adress and made a whole new forums source and everything added grahams anti null and everything. so i started it up and all ran fine but then again after 20 minutes here comes the nulls!
I looked up the ip on google and clicked a website and it was some ip tracker site and the comments on the ip said "this guys name is spike 2147 and he is trouble" so im wondering if someone is actually in my network or something? I need help asap not just to make a server but because this could be a serious secruity problem
Here is the ip 74.115.3.62
If this is an actual person i really wish i could find them and bust the shit out of there computer. I have a feeling it is a security problem because i banned the IP from my computer not just the server. And plus who nulls a server for almost 4 days straight? Please help ALSO the null blocker says its blocking but it still adds like 400 players to the server and crashes. I really just wana start up this server but i cant until this is fixed=\ Heres a pic: [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg528/scaled.php?server=528&filename=wtffuckingnu.jpg&res=medium[/img]

item.title: Need some serious help please.. This is extremely weird shit
